name: Vintage Tea Cup Sticker Set
description:
A cute set of six handmade, vintage tea cup stickers.

They are fantastic for decorating your laptop, furniture or school books!

Illustrated by me and then edited and coloured on photo editing software. The stickers are printed onto lovely glossy sticker paper and then individually hand cut.

Please bare in mind as these are each cut by hand they will not all be exactly the same size but will be very similar!

You will receive one of each colour tea cup as seen in the photos.

These stickers come packed in a clear cello bag.

Each sticker measures approximately 5cm x 4.5cm.

name: Personalised Mason Jar Tote Bag
description:
A vintage mason or jam jar canvas bag, designed and handmade by Hannah Stevens with your own custom name on the label!

Made using 100% natural, unbleached, cotton canvas bags, they are the perfect size for carrying school and university books, using as shopping bags or even just storing your socks in!

This bag would make a great gift for people of all ages!

Strong enough to carry your shopping, yet small enough to keep in your handbag!

--------------------

Please note - This tote bag is made to order and can take up to 7 days to make before dispatching.

--------------------

There are two styles of bags available, the tote bag or the drawstring bag, which is fab for using for school PE kits, swimming kits and PJ bags. The last photo shows an example of the drawstring bag option.

You can personalise this tote bag by having your choice of name/word. Each name is hand drawn and then edited on photo editing software before being transferred onto the tote bag.

Please write your choice of name or word during checkout.

--------------------

Choose from 5 different colour combinations!

--------------------

Each hand drawn design has been edited and coloured on photo editing software, the design is then heat transfer printed by hand onto each 100% cotton canvas bag.

The tote bags are machine washable at around 30-40 degrees, but turn inside out to protect the image. Hang to dry, DO NOT tumble dry. If you need to iron it, place NON STICK baking paper over the image and remove this while the bag is still warm.

--------------------

Tote Bag - 37cm x 42cm // Handles - 66cm each

Drawstring Bag - 38cm x 43cm

name: My Knitting Bag - Tote Bag
description:
Cute illustrated canvas tote bag with pretty coloured scalloped oval and the words "My Knitting Bag' written in my own hand drawn font.

These are fantastic for carrying all your knitting and crafting supplies!

Choose from three colours, Pink, Green or Turqoise.

The design is heat transfer printed by hand onto each 100% natural unbleached cotton canvas tote bag.

--------------------------------------

Variations:

You can choose to have this design on one of the tote bags, or on a drawstring bag! Please write your choice during checkout or email me when ordering.


Measurements:

Tote Bag:
37cm x 42cm
Handles: 66cm each

Drawstring Bag:
38cm x 43cm

--------------------------------------

Please note: These bags are made to order, so please allow up to 5 days for making and dispatching.

Care Information:
The tote bags are machine washable at around 30-40 degrees, but turn inside out to protect the image. Hang to dry, DO NOT tumble dry. If you need to iron it, place NON STICK baking paper over the image and remove this while the bag is still warm.

name: Vintage Tea Pot Tote Bag
description:
Vintage Tea Pot illustrated canvas tote bag, perfect for shopping and carrying school books!

The design is heat transfer printed by hand onto each pink 100% cotton tote bag. The vintage tea pot illustration is printed pale blue with pink flowers and a bold black line.

------------------------------

Variations:

Choose from a tote bag or drawstring bag!

Add your custom name or word, each name is hand painted then edited on photo editing software, ready to add to your bag.

Please write your name/word during checkout or email me when ordering.



Measurements:

Tote Bag:
37cm x 42cm
Handles: 66cm each

Drawstring Bag:
38cm x 43cm

------------------------------

Please note: These bags are made to order, so please allow up to 7 days for making and dispatching.

Care Information: 
The tote bags are machine washable at around 30-40 degrees, but turn inside out to protect the image. Hang to dry, DO NOT tumble dry. If you need to iron it, place NON STICK baking paper over the image and remove this while the bag is still warm.

name: Personalised Vintage Tea Cup Tote Bag
description:
An illustrative, vintage style tea cup with a pretty rose pattern, comes in a variety of pastel colours.

The design is heat transfer printed by hand onto each 100% natural unbleached cotton tote bag. 

The tea cup comes in a variety of six colour ways. Make sure to choose your colour option before ordering, if none is chosen I will send the blue option shown in the photo.

Personalise this bag by choosing a name or word to have in place of 'Emily'. Each name is hand painted, then edited on photo editing software to make each bag individual and unique!

Please write the name or word you would like on the bag during checkout, or you can contact me.

------------------------------------


Measurements:

Tote Bag:
37cm x 42cm
Handles: 66cm each

Drawstring Bag:
38cm x 43cm

--------------------------------------

Please note: These bags are made to order, so please allow up to one week for making and dispatching.

Care Information: 
The tote bags are machine washable at around 30-40 degrees, but turn inside out to protect the image. Hang to dry, DO NOT tumble dry. If you need to iron it, place NON STICK baking paper over the image and remove this while the bag is still warm.
